main.description: During the week I write code, on the weekend I drop passes. üèà
main.bio: I'm a Senior Software Engineer, currently working with Fruit Street Health. I have worked on web projects across many different industries. Everything from tools for small start ups to websites for national brands like Coca Cola and Anheuser Busch. In my downtime I play flag football, video games and cook.

resume.skillmessage: Over the years I've worked on dozens of projects and utilized various different technologies. Below is a high level overview of the technologies I work with currently. The web is constantly evolving and therefore so are my technical skills and interests.

items.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur in nisl turpis. Aliquam aliquet rutrum turpis sit amet porta. Nulla sed tincidunt felis, non rhoncus.

StockX is a 'stock market of things' - a consumer marketplace (like eBay) which connects buyers and sellers using the exact same methods as the New York Stock Exchange. I worked across various areas of the main StockX website, with a focus on quality, I worked with the team to increase test coverage and improve code quality across the application.

Ambassador is the world-leading referral marketing software, running today's most popular referral programs. At Ambassador I delivered unique features to enable marketing teams to fully leverage the power of their affiliates. Everything from dashboards to manage programs to web integrations to power the referral process.

MRM // McCann is a leading customer relationship agency that leverages the power of creativity, the beauty of data, and the magic of technology to nurture, encourage and sustain strong relationships between brands and their customers ‚Äì in turn, creating meaningful experiences for people. At MRM I worked across several teams to support and develop web experiences for prominent brands including Coca-Cola, Anheuser Busch and General Motors.

CareTech Solutions is a full service IT service provider which services major hospital systems across the United States. While at CareTech Solutions I worked on software solutions that streamlined the business and IT processes for dozens of hospitals. Enabling hospitals to focus on care rather than administration.

The Metro Detroit Flag Football League (MDFFL) is an LGBT and straight allied flag football league, changing preconceived societal beliefs about sexual orientation and self-identification. I currently serve on the board of directors and oversee technology as a whole, this includes administering access to systems as well as developing and maintaining the current web presence.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
